name: In One Minute - A Twine Game
name_original: In One Minute - A Twine Game
description:
Your payment's due.

-This was a small text based game I made for college to get started with coding.  Don't expect much.

You are an unnamed protagonist, barely surviving in the harsh environment of New York city.  After the virus hit, you had been suspended from your main job, and forced to live on the streets. With winter fast approaching, you had no choice but to consult a loan shark to lend you the money to buy a temporary apartment. You hoped that you'd've been able to find a new job to help meet your deadline in time, but despite how hard you worked, you were not able  to pay him back in time. Now, he's angry, and the bulky phone on your table seems to be ringing...

-You'll need to acquire all three other endings before you unlock ending 4.

-As of now, this game does not have a saving feature, so if you close the game and come back on, your progress should reset. The game isn't long at all, however. Especially if you know what you're doing!

C R E D I T S

In One Minute, made by me :)

Cutscene Music : " The House" composed and produced by "Vivek Abhishek"
